PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02212012-03-01,  ,  IC,  , 
ActWeights and Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Weights and Measures Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WEIGHTS AND MEASURES REGULATIONS in order to (1) make technical amendments to address concerns expressed by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations regarding the clarity, consistency between the French and English versions, and minor editorial revisions and (2) incorporate in division VI, part V certain specifications which govern the electronic requirements for automatic weighing machines.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0028 Publication Date: 2012-03-14
AttachmentsAttachment
